abstract: Paul Ryan told an interviewer that the Republican tax plan would be “revenue neutral” but said he didn’t have time to explain the math. It is difficult to make it add up.
snippet: Paul Ryan told an interviewer that the Republican tax plan would be “revenue neutral” but said he didn’t have time to explain the math. It is difficult to make it add up.
lead_paragraph: On Fox News Sunday, Paul Ryan said that he didn’t have time to explain the math behind his tax proposal. Fortunately I have a few minutes to spare, so I thought I’d pitch in.

headline.main: The Math on the Romney-Ryan Tax Plan
